Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Dietary Supplement/Fruit and Vegetable Extract
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: Extracts from plants, such as fruits and vegetables, that contain fiber, vitamins, minerals, and other natural substances with antioxidant, lipid-lowering, and antiproliferative properties. Used in chemoprevention therapy, these extracts may prevent the development or recurrence of cancer. (NCI04)
